nodes.bodyText: Don't say latest GA release here. we have same issue in our 3xx mgw docker files too
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,53 @@

+# limitations under the License.
+# -----------------------------------------------------------------------
+
+# TODO: (VirajSalaka) finalize jdk 11 image
+FROM adoptopenjdk:11.0.8_10-jre-hotspot-bionic
+LABEL maintainer="WSO2 Docker Maintainers <dev@wso2.org>" 
+
+ENV LANG=C.UTF-8
+
+ARG MG_USER=wso2
+ARG MG_USER_ID=802
+ARG MG_USER_GROUP=wso2
+ARG MG_USER_GROUP_ID=802
+ARG MG_USER_HOME=/home/${MGW_USER}
+
+ARG MG_VERSION=1.0-SNAPSHOT
+ENV VERSION=${MG_VERSION}
+
+ARG MOTD="\n\
+ Welcome to WSO2 Docker Resources \n\
+ --------------------------------- \n\
+ This Docker container comprises of a WSO2 product, running with its latest GA release \n\

+[req]
+distinguished_name = req_distinguished_name
+x509_extensions = v3_req
+prompt = no
+[req_distinguished_name]
+C = US
+ST = VA
+L = SomeCity
+O = MyCompany
+OU = MyDivision
+CN = www.company.com
+[v3_req]
+keyUsage = keyEncipherment, dataEncipherment
+extendedKeyUsage = serverAuth
+subjectAltName = @alt_names
